Text:
Ron Paul not only takes money from white supremacist groups, but seems to have no problem with it. Why are you fucking morons still supporting the shithead? HE IS A BIGOT! He's gonna make this country a safe place for little white children by shipping out all them damn niggers, kikes, spics, and women!

I stand by my statement- if Ron Paul is elected president, I will move to Israel.

i get a kick out of that comment, your nothing but a racist yourself and a bigot. And im guessing by your statements you lobby yourself hard for israel? Go move to israel, be one less racist/bigot. And i hope ron paul wins it, then maybe you will be the victim of some SB'er in the middle east.


Shipping out all the minorities.....that is such a sad statement it just says right there how ignorant you are, mississippi public school system for the lose?
